Review Text: i'm a 7th grade communications major here and I love it so much. I will have to leave next year and that's really sad because i don't think I'll ever find a school that I can compare to Bak. I have made so many wonderful and diverse friends â€¦

Review Text: i went to bak for 2 years and its a great school, but not for me .i have a problem with stress and its a very rigorous school. i had migraines daily and my grades dropped being so stressed i had depression.but i learned many things that i â€¦

Name: BAK
Review Text: Good school, teachers really nice, the visual arts program teaches you a lot of useful skills and promotes creativity. Bak used to be better in the older days, but it's still good. â€¦

Name: BAK
Review Text: Meh. That's the word you could use to describe this school. I tried out in 6th grade and I got in. So far, I was excited to go to theater and do things actively.. until I actually went in. The first few days of it was good, but then I â€¦

Name: BAK
Review Text: I went to this school for two years as a visual arts major, but moved to California before eight grade started. My new school is "the best in the High Desert". Let's just say I feel really bad for everyone that went to school in the High Desert. California schools can't compare to Bak MSOA! Go Stars!

Name: BAK
Review Text: I've heard so many good compliments and reviews on Bak. BMSOA doesn't stand for Bak Middle School of the Arts, it stands for BEST Middle School of Awesomeness! My parents are still considering about sending me and BMSOA Representatives came â€¦

Name: BAK
Review Text: WARNING DO NOT GO TO THIS SCHOOL!!!! I got in for theatre and I'm in 6th grade but I just left during spring break because I broke my foot but even if I didn't I would've left next year. This school is amazing for every single major except â€¦

Name: BAK
Review Text: I'm an 8th grade vocal major at Bak. Bak has been the best experience of my life and I couldn't ask for more. Also don't believe comments that people write that don't even go to the school there are not true.

Name: BAK
Review Text: I'm an 8th grade communications major, and it's been great. Though some particular classes are more demanding then others, (Welcome to hell, ENG students. All 7th grade communications majors, prepare for freakin' war) and some students are â€¦

Name: BAK
Review Text: The teachers and administration do not take action on certain things and they take sides for certain people. The discipline actions are stupid. for example not having a student ID is a detention. The school is good for some kids but in some art areas not alot is being taught and same goes in academic classes.
